basics.name: Alexander Mahler Resume
basics.label: Senior Software Test Engineer
basics.summary: From Los Angeles, but lives in Portland, Oregon. Hardworking, collaborative, with attention to detail. Very passionated not just about testing, but also UX/UI. I really enjoy anything Javascript related. Experienced writing test plans, test cases and working in/creating automation frameworks.

work.name: Paylocity
work.summary: Worked on the reporting product for the time and labor portion. Worked across multiple teams with automation that spaneed multiple teams to continue to deliver an amazing product for our customers
highlights: A video thank you from our CFO from outstanding performance
Developed the first API testing Suite for the category
Helped automate every sprint to deliver an amazing product
Category quality leader to help teams hit their quality goals
Help configure the automation pipeline running on Team City
Taught Testing Workshops

work.name: Amazon
work.summary: Worked with product owners, offshore and developers to help ship the latest amazon fire tablet
highlights: Shipped the new table with at least 4.5 star reviews
Built out the testing structure with offshore and test rail
Helped shaped features based off prior exprience to help develop the best product possible

work.name: DriveTime
work.summary: Working with developers, devops and product owners in a sometimes kanban/scrume style. Responsive for helping flush out requirements, creating test plans and test cases, automation and manual/exploratory testing
highlights: Built out the UI Automation Framework
Built out the API Autiomation Framework
Redesigned how test cases are structured
Work with QA Lead to help create a uniform QA Methodology across company
Assit in mentoring junior and manual testers
Helping launch the brand new mobile site and mobile applications

work.name: MeltMedia
work.summary: A design and development agency. Worked and own multipled projects. Built internal tools used by BA's, PO's, and Dev's
highlights: Creating test scripts using Selenium with Python
Reviewing UX/UI designs to try to find bugs before development
Mentoring Junior testesr
Built out tons of QA Documentation
Worked on open source software
